content: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services! My name is Ava, the virtual assistant. To get started, may I have your name, please?
Thank you, Mara! Could you please provide the address where you need service?
Thank you. What type of service do you need today? (For example: plumbing, electrical, or HVAC)
I have a plumbing issue, my sink is leaking.
Got it, a leaking sink. When would be a good time for us to come by and take care of that for you?
Let me check our calendar to see if we have availability tomorrow morning for your plumbing issue.
I'm sorry, I'm having trouble accessing our appointment calendar right now. Let me connect you with a human agent to assist further.
reason: AI unable to check calendar due to system error.

content: Hi Mara, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the delay—our system had a hiccup. I’ve checked and we do have an opening for tomorrow morning! Would between 8–10 AM work for you?
Yes, 8-10 is fine. Please send someone then.

Great, Mara! You’re all set. Our technician will arrive between 8–10 AM tomorrow at 123 Maple Avenue to fix your leaking sink. We'll send a reminder before arrival. If you have any other questions, just reply to this number.
